ModMetadata.Name: PowerOverhaul
ModMetadata.Author: Cubernetik
ModMetadata.Description:
[h1]Because plumbing should not need its own power plant.[/h1] Brings sanity back to the power consumption of the gas devices PressureRegulator, BackPressureRegulator, VolumePump and GasMixer.
Allows configuration for the power usage on a scale from 5% to 100%.
The source code of the mod can be found on https://github.com/Cubernetik/StationeersPowerOverhaul.
